Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/83rd
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 87th, Ashland, 79th and Racine due to street blockage near Racine/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 87th, Ashland, 79th. then resume their normal route on Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Racine/83rd.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on the train at Rockwell. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on the train at Rockwell. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Constance
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey and 79th due to fire department activity near 79th/Constance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey, then resume their normal route on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to fire department activity near 79th/Constance.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Kedzie, 95th, Western, then resume their normal route on 95th due to street blockage nr 87th/Western

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Kedzie, 95th, Western, then resume their normal route on 95th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 87th/Western.
